timeline.message: Add all html elements, add delete functionality
Move load and delete functionality to service
Connect the client to the server for delete and get requests

timeline.author: anditurdiu

replies.bodyText: please revert this change, this is a specific distinction for Orion, the IntelliJ plugin. I guess this button is shown in Orion (not in Artemis), the same one (below) is shown in Artemis, but not in Orion.
replies.author: krusche

timeline.message:
Add course as a field to access the isAtLeastInstructor flag
Also some linting

Add duration pipe to show duration of the exam correctly
The pipe handles differences of less than 24 and over 24 hours
Show 0 if there are no registered students instead of 'empty'

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't be "Beginn" be a better naming? "Beginn" indicates a point in time whereas "Anfang" indicates more an area in time imo.
timeline.author: julian-christl

timeline.message: add jest tests and gradlew spotlessApply

Update exam.json

Replace Anfang with Beginn

replies.bodyText: This is a specific filter for Orion. It specifies that the button should be shown in Orion. I think for now we can leave this out for all exam related functionalities
replies.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: HH:mm is used in ArtemisDatePipe so it would be good to be consistent here :-)
timeline.author: sascha11110
sascha11110
sascha11110

timeline.bodyText: You are not using it so I think you can remove it. Also ArtemisDatePipe does not apply the format length to its time format so you will definitely not need it.
timeline.author: sascha11110
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+import { Pipe, PipeTransform } from '@angular/core';
+import * as moment from 'moment';
+
+@Pipe({ name: 'durationTo' })
+export class DurationPipe implements PipeTransform {
+    /**
+     * Calculate the duration of an event from the diff of two dates.
+     * @param startDate The start date time of the event. Must be convertible to moment().
+     * @param endDate The end date time of the event. Must be convertible to moment().
+     * @param format Format of the localized date time. Defaults to 'long'.
+     * @returns string 'HH:mm'
+     */
+    transform(
+        startDate: Date | moment.Moment | string | number | null,
+        endDate: Date | moment.Moment | string | number | null,
+        format: 'short' | 'long' | 'short-date' | 'long-date' | 'time' = 'long',

timeline.bodyText: Again: do wee need OrionModule here?
timeline.author: sascha11110

replies.bodyText: I would leave it out for now
replies.author: krusche

timeline.message:
Code Cleanup: artemis-duration.pipe.ts
- remove unused parameter
- remove console.log entries
- Show duration in format HH:mm for consistency
Merge branch 'feature/exam-mode/exam-management' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/exam-mode/exam-management

timeline.bodyText:
I would like to keep this feature disabled on production for now. So we should keep this attribute.
You can set it to true for testing, but we should set it to false again before we deploy the new features to production
timeline.author: krusche
